basic_information.scholarship_name: Viola Bowman Memorial Scholarship for Strings-NOMINATION

description: This scholarship was established in 1981 to support the strings division. Eligibility Any student studying a string instrument within the School of Music regardless of major Minimum GPA of 3.0 in string-related classes Minimum cumulative GPA of 2.5 Enrolling full-time (12+ credit hours) Requirements AWARDED BY COMMITTEE NOMINATION. Nominated student(s) will be invited to apply by the college's scholarship coordinator. Recipient must be actively involved in the School of Music String Division through events, programs and performances.

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
